title: Piney Data
text: Welcome to Piney Data, where we help non-profit organizations and small to medium-sized businesses grow their data and analytics know-how. We focus on getting you started and leverage evergreen analytics to achieve your goals.

title: Piney Data
text:
About Us
As a data analytics consultantcy, we specialize in helping organizations begin to leverage data to achieve their goals. We bring a decade of experience leveraging data in fundraising, insurance, finance, e-commerce, and risk management. We can help you get your analytics practice off of the ground floor. We provide strategic adivce for measuring success, data-driven insights, road maps for analyzing and managing data, and developing customized plans to enhance organizational effectiveness.
We are enthusiastic about helping non-profits start their data and analytics practice to enable an evergreen analytics approach that ensures long-term success and sustainability. Our ultimate mission is to empower non-profits to make a positive impact on society while achieving sustainability.

title: Piney Data
text:
Services
We offer a range of services to help organizations start or develop their data and analytics practice, including:

Data infrastructure consulting
Customized data analysis and reporting
Identifying and tracking measures of success
Customer engagement strategies
Fundraising and grant writing support
Marketing and social media analytics

title: Piney Data
text:
Why Choose Us
At Piney Data, we are committed to helping our clients achieve their goals by providing practical, actionable insights that are grounded in data. We are passionate about the work we do and believe that every organization has the potential to make a meaningful impact on the world.

title: Piney Data
text:
Contact Us
To learn more about how we can help your organization, please contact us at info@pineydata.com or schedule a chat here.
